title: World News | INSV Kaundinya's Voyage to Retrace Ancient Indian Transoceanic Trade Routes, Showcases Legacy of Timeless Maritime Connect
description: Get latest articles and stories on World at LatestLY. As INSV Kaundinya is set to embark on its maiden voyage on December 29, the sailing vessel represents the legacy of stitched shipbuilding and India's timeless maritime connect with the Indian Ocean world.

title: Ancient UK coastal path quietly slips into the sea and is gone forever

title: Photo of Buddhist stupas in France spotlights Kashmir’s ancient past: PM
description: An old photograph found in France has revealed Kashmir's glorious past. The blurry image shows three Buddhist stupas in Baramulla. This discovery dates back nearly two thousand years. Large human-made structures were found in Jammu and Kashmir. These findings highlight the region's rich cultural and historical heritage. The Buddhist complex in Zehanpora reminds us of Kashmir's past identity.

title: 'Mann Ki Baat': PM Modi Shares How Blurred Photos In France Helped Revive Kashmir's Rich Ancient Buddhist Legacy
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi shared the story of rediscovering a 2,000-year-old Buddhist complex in Jehanpora, Baramulla, Jammu and Kashmir, during his Mann Ki Baat program. The site’s remains were identified through drone surveys and linked to a blurred historic photograph found in a French museum, revealing Kashmir’s rich cultural and historical heritage.

title: Kala-Koreish Tourism: Exploring Dagestan’s Ancient Mountain Village of Silence and Mystery
description: Kala-Koreish Tourism: Exploring Dagestan’s Ancient Mountain Village of Silence and MysteryDiscover Kala-Koreish in Dagestan, an ancient mountain village known for its quiet, mystical atmosphere and heritage tourism appeal.The post Kala-Koreish Tourism: Exploring Dagestan’s Ancient Mountain Village of Silence and Mystery appeared first on Travel And Tour World.
